entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 08:29 AM CDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 08:29 AM CDT Sunday 26 March 2023
